search_query: ServiceNow ITSM competitors 2025 workflow automation market
context: The global ITSM market is projected to grow from $10.5B (2023) to $22.1B (2028) at 15.9% CAGR. ServiceNow's 2025 acquisition of Moveworks signals industry shift toward AI-native integrated service management platforms. Competition is intensifying with both enterprise players (BMC, Jira) and mid-market alternatives (Freshservice, Ivanti) targeting ServiceNow's 40-60% higher pricing. The market is transitioning from bolt-on AI tools to integrated AI-driven platforms.

competitors.name: BMC Helix ITSM
competitors.notes: ServiceNow's biggest competitor, offering AI/ML-powered ITSM with deployment flexibility (on-premise, cloud, hybrid). Key differentiator vs ServiceNow's SaaS-only model, appealing to enterprises with strict regulatory requirements

competitors.name: Jira Service Management
competitors.notes: Atlassian's ITSM platform with seamless integration into broader Atlassian suite, connecting IT operations with software development teams. Free version available for up to 3 agents

competitors.name: Freshservice
competitors.notes: Cloud-based ITSM platform focused on simplicity and quick deployment, designed to be intuitive from day one with AI-driven ticket management. Easier to deploy than ServiceNow

competitors.name: Ivanti Neurons
competitors.notes: No-code workflow design platform with AI-powered chatbots and automatic issue detection/resolution. Enables business managers to design workflows without coding

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Strong in service management with AI capabilities for triaging requests and automating workflows, providing comprehensive visibility into service interactions

competitors.name: SolarWinds Service Desk
competitors.notes: Advanced ITSM features but requires more setup and expertise compared to simpler alternatives

competitors.name: Halo ITSM
competitors.notes: Emerging alternative offering comprehensive ITSM capabilities at lower price points than ServiceNow

competitors.name: Atomicwork
competitors.notes: Modern AI-native service management platform emerging as ServiceNow alternative

competitors.name: Open Source Alternatives
competitors.notes: GLPI (full ITSM suite), iTop (CMDB-focused), Zammad (helpdesk/ticketing), osTicket (support ticketing) - cost-effective options for budget-conscious organizations
